data.text:
C
```c 
printf("Hello, world\n"); 
``` 

C++
```cpp 
cout << "Hello, world" << endl;
``` 

Java
```java 
System.out.println("Hello, world"); 
``` 

C#
```cs 
Console.WriteLine("Hello, world"); 
``` 

Python
```python 
print("Hello, world") 
```

```js 
console.log("Hello, world"); 
```

```rust
println!("Hello, world");
```

```lisp 
(print "Hello, world"); 
```
